original_text: And he made the breastplate of cunning work, like the work of the ephod; of gold, blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen.
korean_text: 그가 또 흉패를 정교하게 짜되 에봇과 같은 모양으로 금 실과 청색 자색 홍색 실과 가늘게 꼰 베 실로 하였으니

sentences.original_text: And he made the breastplate of cunning work,
like the work of the ephod;
and scarlet, and fine twined linen.
